entry.title: New release for Baserow: 1.30.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

  • Non-standard image formats don't break thumbnails #2745
  • handle null payload for file field #2906
  • Fix search for number field with applied formating #3292
  • Fix a bug that prevent a database index to be created when sorting/grouping by a duration field. #3296
  • Fix admin dashboard translations
  • Fix loading non en and fr translations for premium and enterprise in production mode.
  • Fix API docs server side rendering bugs.

entry.title: New release for Baserow: 1.31.0
entry.content:
New features

  • Allow optionally exporting in publicly shared views. #1213
  • Allow skipping files during Airtable import #1225
  • [Builder] Introducing query parameters #1661
  • [Builder] Ensure that sensitive Integration data is not exported. #1863
  • Add support for the Collaborator field type in formulas and lookups. #1890
  • [Builder] Enhance security by excluding unused fields from the Data Source context. #3001
  • Add distribution aggregation. #3056
  • [Builder] Added radius settings for Element background and border. #3068
  • [Builder] Add support for Custom Colors in Theme settings. #3068
  • [Builder] Add vertical and horizontal gap to Repeat Element. #3068
  • [Builder] Added the ability to set the Font Weight for various elements in the Theme settings. #3068
  • Periodic data sync #3071
  • Number lookup field filters #3112
  • Improve the export progress update #3184
  • Notify other windows about started jobs. #3198
  • Workspace context menu search #3265
  • Optionally allow choosing view in the local Baserow table data sync. #3266
  • Add support to filter lookup of multiple select fields. #3277
  • Added support for filtering lookups of date fields. #3362
  • Add filter support for formula referencing a multiple collaborator field. #3400
  • Add button xlarge type variant.
  • [Builder] Focus search input when opening add element modal

Bug fixes

  • Fix invalid regular expression error raised when creating a formula with an invalid regex #1053
  • Fix formula issue with lookup and UUID as primary field #1867
  • Fix formula issue with lookup and UUID as primary field #2354
  • Fix import/export/snapshot issue with broken formulas #2711
  • Validate request.data before views reaching to .data early #2740
  • [Builder] Fix worfklow action navigation for pages with no parameters #2833
  • Fix issue with text changing position when renaming items in the sidebar #2883
  • Display progress of pending jobs in the sidebar when the workspace is empty #2904
  • Fix is empty/not empty filter behavior for single select field with deleted options #3053
  • [Builder] Filter out unused fields from dispatched Workflow Actions. #3090
  • Restore decoration value ids during table import #3193
  • Allow editors to subscribe to a form view. #3271
  • Fix crash when invalid value is passed to link row fields with read-only primary field in the linked table. #3277
  • Long text in full text search overflows window content. #3285
  • [Builder] Resolved an error triggered when a workflow action would attempt to write or update a row pointing to a date field with an invalid value. #3286
  • [Builder] Resolved an issue with the 'refresh data source' action when the data source was shared across multiple pages. #3308
  • Count/Rollup fields will reset through_field when recalculating linked row field removal #3309
  • Fix a bug causing the backend to fail hard when sorting by an AI Field. #3310
  • Fix Airtable import failing if the 'foreignRowId' key is missing. #3317
  • [Builder] Fixed a bug that caused an error during export when the application had a background image in the page section of the theme. #3320
  • [Builder] Resolved an error which was thrown when a data source's integration was destroyed. #3323
  • [Builder] Resolved a styling issue in the Link element, and the Table element link type when swapping between link and button variants. #3325
  • Fix an issue with frontend when looking up formatted number fields. #3332
  • [Builder] Allow children of Header and Footer elements to set their width. #3333
  • Fix field settings suggestions for lookup and formula fields. #3336
  • Fix a bug causing the frontend to crash when trying to hide fields directly after creating a timeline. #3358
  • [Builder] Fixed bug that caused a workspace import to fail when certain fields were missing. #3375
  • Exclude Link to table fields dependencies from periodic updates #3379
  • [Builder] Resolved a bug in filtered table elements which prevented their workflow actions from dispatching properly. #3399
  • Fix broken Heroku addons and one-click-deploy button URL. #3401
  • Fix backend/frontend formula sort differences. #3410
  • [Builder] Fix children element style in element menu when the container is selected #3420
  • [Builder] Fix issue when previewing templates in some situations #3421
  • [Builder] Fix failing delete action
  • [Builder] Resolved an error which prevented 'summarize field' data sources from being used.
  • Fix dashboard no workspace translations
  • Fix publicly shared view URL not always visible because it does't fit.
  • Remove checkbox line-height

Refactors

  • Upgrade vue-chartjs from 4.x to 5.x #1683
  • Code cleanup for advanced number formatting #3293
  • Add user id to sentry issues. #3338
  • [Builder] Improve element selection performance when there are many elements
  • Improve field dependency rebuild by doing operations in bulk.
  • Improve lookup rebuild from field names method performance.
  • Improve view field change type performance by doing update in bulk.
  • Various small query performance improvements related to deleting and updating fields.

Breaking API changes

  • Remove support for PostgreSQL 11. #3371

entry.title: New release for Baserow: 1.31.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

  • [Builder] Resolved an issue in data source filters and sortings which prevented them from working correctly when the database field they were associated with were trashed. #3378
  • Fixed an issue where the notification mode settings were not displayed correctly if the row was not in the view. #3411
  • Disable optimistic updates for rows with filters, sorts, or group by on backend-calculated read-only fields. #3415
  • Fixed issue where collaborator names were not displayed in filter when scrolling or searching #3431
  • [Builder] Resolved an issue which prevented tables from paging correctly.
  • Fix indentation bug where duplicate table entries were added.
  • Fix iCal feed when the table has select_related fields from enhance_queryset.

entry.title: New release for Baserow: 1.32.0
entry.content:
New features

  • Add support for collaborator fields in form views. #1554
  • [Dashboard] Introduce dashboards with summary and chart widgets #2206
  • [Database] Introduce row update functionality during table import #2213
  • [Database] Add rows enter view webhook event type. #3009
  • [Core] Hide Baserow description in all emails if logo is changed. #3066
  • [Builder] Allow to customize table header filter/sort/search buttons #3151
  • [Builder] Introduced Saml and OpenID Connect authentication in the application builder. #3167
  • [Builder] Added a shortcut in the publishing modal so that domains can be created if an application doesn't yet have any. #3170
  • [Builder] Improve 'Add new element' modal. #3172
  • Add abilty to export files in grid #3203
  • Airtable import report. #3263
  • [Database] Show relationship changes (added or removed) in the related row's change history. #3264
  • Multiple collaborator field group by support. #3447
  • Airtable import field type improvements. #3455
  • [Builder] Added a container element to group multiple elements. #3458
  • [Builder] Improved the performance of published applications. #3472
  • [Builder] Added the Menu element. #3477
  • [Builder] Added theme setting to configure Link decoration. #3515
  • [Database] Introduced the ability to sort by single select option order. #786
  • [Database] Import Airtable view colors. #793
  • [Database] Import Airtable view filters. #793
  • Import Airtable grid views, their sorts, group by, and field options. #793
  • Add SegmentControl variants
  • [Builder] Introduced a shortcut in the Login form configuration so that it's easier to create a new user source.
  • Send notification to authorized user when periodic data sync is deactivated.
  • Send notification to all admins when a webhook is deactivated.

Bug fixes

  • Preserve the precision of the currency field in the Airtable import. #1058
  • [Builder] Fixed element position resets on editing of it's properties #2342
  • Fix pasting markdown text into rich edit that resulted in unformatted markdown #2383
  • [Database] Fixed a bug that prevented duplicating views filtered by a collaborator correctly. #3017
  • [Database] Fixed unscrollable timezone dropdown issue when creating/editing a field. #3041
  • [Database] Fix protected fields in the data sync forms. #3191
  • Database: when an error is returned by the backend, it will be shown inside of the body of the view, so user still have access to navigation interface. #3331
  • [Database] Fix issue with unexpected temperature argument passed to OpenAI messages.create #3384
  • [Database] Allow bigger image dimensions. #3387
  • Preserve the currency symbol and formatting of the currency field in Airtable import. #3395
  • Prevent view from updated state with data from wrong view when pending request completes. #3398
  • [Database] Fix for data sync failing when syncing baserow table with AIField #3403
  • Use BigIntegerField for ImportExportResource.size #3424
  • [Builder] Fix updating of page parameters when URL query parameters change. #3434
  • [Database] Fix field formatting options in rollup fields targeting formula fields #3443
  • Fixed null check for query parameters in link URL generation #3444
  • [Database] Do not register jobs that have unknown job type in the job type in the registry. #3447
  • Fix for Secure File Serve with SSO SAML/OIDC authentication #3449
  • [Builder] Resolved a bug where creating an element with an invalid parent would raise an error. #3452
  • [Builder] Add page background color to theme block #3457
  • [Database] Updating a cell no longer fails when a view is sorted or grouped by a linked field whose primary field is a formula. #3484
  • [Database] Fix for creating snapshot triggers infinite loop for checking status update #3490
  • [Database] Allow change field type with active sort #3519
  • [Builder] Fix broken pagination after filtering collection elements
  • [Builder] Fix crash when creating a builder application after deleting another one
  • Fix error when syncing a table with a trashed field.
  • [Database] Fix the progress bar percentage when importing applications into the workspace.
  • [Database] Fix select option values in row history after API changes.

Refactors

  • Upgrade vuelidate #2805
  • [Builder] Improve data dispatching performances #2978
  • Reduce the number of queries when logging in or load Baserow. #3364
  • [Builder] Improve integration endpoint performances #3418
  • Lowered grid view minimum field with from 100 to 78. #3428
  • [Builder] Improved performance in preview mode
  • Speed up database setup for tests

entry.title: New release for Baserow: 1.32.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes

  • [Database] Fixed a bug in which sorting by a link row field caused the frontend to crash. #3522
